Lyric:
[by:Lin-ym]
[ti:Bedroom Shadows]
[ar:The High Dials]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:40.85]I've been living like this for long time
[00:49.91]Fumbling towards you in the dark
[00:58.68]I can't go on in this way forever
[01:07.29]Won't you call out to me, call me now
[01:16.42]'Cause if you keep hiding like you do
[01:24.03]How can I find my way to you?
[01:32.70]oh, I hope that someday soon
[01:36.69]Someday turns on the lights in this room
[01:41.63]So I can see your face
[01:45.36]And hold you to me
[01:48.05]
[02:08.28]I don't mind accepting life is lonely
[02:16.79]We come in and then we leave alone
[02:25.41]I only want to know that you can see me
[02:33.98]I want to feel you feel me, touch me know
[02:43.40]'Cause if you keep hiding like you do
[02:50.96]How can I find my way to you?
[02:59.41]oh, I hope that someday soon
[03:03.45]Someday turns on the lights in this room
[03:08.74]So I can see your face
[03:14.41]And hold you to me
